title: Animal health field stations
brief_description: Research at the CSIRO Animal Research Laboratory at Parkville, Melbourne, is aimed at maintaining the health of sheep, cattle, pigs and poultry improving their productive performance. To succeed with this program the Laboratory has field stations at Maribyrnong, Werribee and Seymour, where animals can be reared free of specified diseases.
